Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Modifies the factors to be considered when making a parole release decision
Summary: Modifies the factors to be considered when making a parole release decision; updates the term "inmate" to "incarcerated person".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to modifying the factors to be considered when making a parole release decision
